EmailTemplate.name: Second Prospecting Email - Only send to prospects in high sales volume states wh
EmailTemplate.subject: Palmetto Solar - We'd like to Partner with {Company Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.Name},
I just wanted to follow up on my last email to see if you had time to connect in the coming days to discuss partnering with Palmetto. One topic I didn't mention before, if we were to partner and you wanted to stand up additional installation crews, we have a 0% Kickstarter loan program for our partners of up to $100,000 which can help you stand up that crew quicker and with zero impact to your current budget. We just ask that you pay back a portion of that loan each time you install a job for us. In most instances, our build partners are able to pay us back in a matter of a few months. At this juncture, we'd easily be able to keep one or more of your crews busy on a full-time basis. Better yet, this would have little impact on your overhead as we provide fully ready-to-install residential solar projects and handle all of the project management, design, and permitting. Use This Meeting Link to view my availability and schedule a time directly on my calendar.
Cheers,
